trans-unit.source: Associates a well-known object type that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator with a remote endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the type.
trans-unit.target: Associa il tipo di un oggetto noto che viene passato al generatore WSDL (Web Services Description Language) a un endpoint remoto in grado di elaborare messaggi inviati a un metodo su tale tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType> class is used to hold information that is specified on the command line to the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) through the `-types` argument.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType> classe viene utilizzata per contenere le informazioni specificate nella riga di comando per il [strumento Soapsuds (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5) tramite il `-types` argomento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" />.

trans-unit.source: The object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is passed to the WSDL generator.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto passato al generatore WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> class with the object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> con il <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto passato al generatore WSDL (Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is passed to the WSDL generator.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto passato al generatore WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The well-known endpoint that can process messages that are sent to a method on the object type that is specified in the <c>type</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Endpoint noto in grado di elaborare messaggi inviati a un metodo sul tipo dell'oggetto specificato nel parametro <c>key</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> class with the URL and <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an object that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> con l'URL e il <see cref="T:System.Type" /> di un oggetto passato al generatore WSDL (Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: Gets the object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto passato al generatore WSDL (Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that the current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> was created for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto per il quale è stato creato il <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of an object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is passed to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generator.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'URL del <see cref="T:System.Type" /> di un oggetto passato al generatore WSDL (Web Services Description Language).

trans-unit.source: The URL of an object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that the current <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> was created for.
trans-unit.target: URL del <see cref="T:System.Type" /> di un oggetto per il quale è stato creato il <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.ServiceType" /> corrente.
